tourBios.carHigh: Has previously played on the Canadian and eGolf tours.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was an All-American four times and won seven NCAA events, including the NCAA West Regional at California State University-Stanislaus. Won the 2006 Northern California Amateur Championship and the 2001 Northern California Junior Amateur.

tourBios.carHigh:
2013: Missed five of six cuts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica.2013: Missed five of six cuts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica.

2012: Made the cut in all nine of his starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica, with one top-10. Finished sixth at the Puerto Rico Classic on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica.

2010: Missed the cut at the Fresh Express Classic on the Web.com Tour.

2009: Missed the cut at the Stonebrae Classic. 
2010: Missed the cut at the Fresh Express Classic in his only Web.com Tour start.

2009: Made his Web.com Tour debut at the Stonebrae Classic. Opened with a 79 then recovered with a 67 but still missed the cut.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was a three-time league MVP and three-time District Player of the Year at Ceres High School in Calif...A four-time, All-American at Cal State Stanislaus, where he won seven NCAA events, including the NCAA Division II West Regional...Won the 2006 Northern California Amateur Championship and the 2001 Northern California Junior Amateur.
tourBios.personal: Attended Ceres High School in Ceres, Calif., in the San Joaquin Valley...Biggest thrill outside of golf was being the best man in his brother's wedding...Favorite course is Spyglass Hill, and he would like to play Cypress Point and Augusta National...Grew up a San Francisco Giants and 49ers fan...Favorite TV show is "Breaking Bad," and movie is "The Shawshank Redemption."...Enjoys listenging to the Black Keys and the Kings of Leon...Favorite athlete in another sport is Roger Federer...Likes to travel to San Diego and Charleston, S.C...Would include his dad, brother and Ben Hogan in a dream foursome...Bucket list includes skydiving, driving across the United States and seeing the anciet ruins of Machu Picchu in Peru...Spent time as an assistant manager with a construction company...Not many people know he is a health nut...Twitter account is @RyanRThornberry.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was 6th in 2012 at the Puerto Rico Classic.
